attributes.review: My phone has always been fast and efficient. But as soon as I download this app.. CRASHED! Just like that. Now I have to write this review on my iPad. Awful, horrible, inefficient, stupid, ancient app. Just don't.
attributes.title: Broke my phone

attributes.review: TikTok is a very useful, app and it has helped me through my worst days. Life has been terrible and I go to tiktok to vent, so I’m getting this app deleted also because Donald J Trump is tryna ban my source of happieness so let’s get this app deleted too 😑
attributes.title: 𝑻𝒉𝒊𝒔 𝒊𝒔 𝒏𝒐𝒕 𝒐𝒌

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and was petting my cat. All seemed normal but then he started talking and turned into a fairy princess that killed my family!! Do not download!! It does nothing good and provides misleading information. It lied about cat conversion.
attributes.title: Broke my cat

attributes.review: I try the app but since the first minute, it didn’t work it glitch all the time, it should be banned
attributes.title: It glitches all the time, this app does not work at all

attributes.review: This app RUINED my marriage! The developers got my address, came to my house, and stole my wife! Now I’ll never see her again. LeAnn if you’re reading this just know that the kids and I miss you very much
attributes.title: Terrible app!

attributes.review: after downloading this game i quickly realized this was a cash grab. in the first two minutes i was bombarded by ads. and after having this app downloaded for two days my device started running very slowly. it got so bad that my samsung 6 ft tall full hd 1080p quality mini fridge ran faster than my device. so over all i would not recommend this app.
attributes.title: what a horrible app

attributes.review: Right after I downloaded the app my grandmother died and my two dogs. All my tacos also disappeared when I got the app and now I have rats in my apartment. My grandmother and dogs were healthy. Trump cursed me and my family 😿
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: When I first opened the app it started to glitch my phone and then my phone froze. My WiFi shut down after that. Then out of nowhere spongebob showed up on my phone. Started to dance and threatened me.
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!❌

attributes.review: Not only was this app incredibly slow, but every time I opened it and saw the ugliest orange man on the face of the planet, I started pooping uncontrollably. I pooped for so long that I lost 20 lbs. props to trump for sickening you so much that you get skinny.
attributes.title: This app gave me massive diarrhoea

attributes.review: This app took all of my personal information. It also made my phone screen cracked, I would never download this again.
attributes.title: This app is horrible
